class epyk.core.html.HtmlRadio.Switch(report, records, label, color, width, height, htmlCode, profile)¶
click(onFncs=None, offFncs=None)¶

Set the click property for the Switch

Usage:

sw = rptObj.ui.buttons.switch({'on': "true", 'off': 'false'})
sw.click([

rptObj.js.console.log(sw.content)

])

Parameters

  • onFncs – List. The list of JavaScript functions

  • offFncs – List. The list of JavaScript functions

property dom¶

HTML Dom object

Return type

JsHtmlSelect.JsHtmlSwitch

property js¶
Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsQueryUi.Autocomplete
